backend/app/core/graph.py.description: Import paths verified for LangGraph 1.0.5: 'from langgraph.graph import StateGraph, START, END' and 'from langgraph.graph.message import add_messages' are still valid. No changes required. Alternative location 'langgraph.constants' also has START/END.

backend/agent_graph.py.description: Agent graph verification passed with LangGraph 1.0.5. Graph structure: nodes=['agent', 'tools'], state=['messages'], tools=[search_pubmed, search_sukl_drugs]. Compiles to CompiledStateGraph successfully without LangChain/LangGraph deprecation warnings.

backend/requirements.txt.description: Dependency installation verified: langchain 1.2.0, langchain-core 1.2.5, langgraph 1.0.5, langgraph-checkpoint 3.0.1. No version conflicts. Virtual environment created in /venv.

backend/verify_graph_compilation.py.description: Verification script requires project root in PYTHONPATH (not just backend/) because code uses 'backend.app.core...' imports. Also needs env vars: SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, PUBMED_EMAIL (can use dummy values for compilation tests).

backend/tests/.description: All 84 tests pass after LangChain/LangGraph upgrade. Tests require environment variables (SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, PUBMED_EMAIL) to be set. Warnings are from Pydantic deprecated validators and datetime.utcnow() - not LangChain/LangGraph related.

backend/app/schemas/query.py.description: Fixed Pydantic V1 @validator deprecation: Migrated to @field_validator with mode='before' and @classmethod decorator. Changed Config class to model_config dict.

backend/data_processing/config/settings..description: Fixed Pydantic V2 class Config deprecation: Migrated to model_config = SettingsConfigDict(...) for pydantic-settings BaseSettings class.

backend/pytest.ini.description: Created pytest configuration with filterwarnings to catch deprecation warnings from application code while filtering third-party library warnings (pyparsing/pyiceberg from supabase dependency chain).

backend/app/core/graph.py, backend/agent.description: LangGraph 1.0.5 is fully backward compatible with existing graph implementations. No breaking changes in: StateGraph API, START/END imports, add_messages annotation, ToolNode, tools_condition, workflow.compile(). All 84 tests pass after dependency upgrade.
